treatment-md.title: Xestoblatta buhrnheimi Silva-da-Silva & Lopes, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Two new species of Xestoblatta Hebard, 1916 from Brazil, a redescription of Xestoblattaroppai Rocha e Silva Albuquerque & Fraga, 1975 and a key for the species of the buscki group (Blattodea, Ectobiidae, Blattellinae)
